00046 static const uint8_t default4StepSequence[4] = {0x1, 0x2, 0x4, 0x8};                                    
00048 static const uint8_t default8StepSequence[8] = {0x1,0x3,0x2,0x6,0x4,0xc,0x8,0x9};

00051 class shiftDevice
00052 {
00053         protected:      
00055 
00060                 uint8_t         *channels;              
00062 
00065                 uint8_t         chanCount;              
00066         public:
00068 
00077                 virtual void    doDevTick (uint8_t bytesPerBoard, 
00078                                                                         uint8_t *boardBytes);
00080                 uint8_t                 *getChannels (void);    
00082                 uint8_t                 getChanCount (void);    
00083 };      
00084 
00086 class shiftStepMotor : public shiftDevice
00087 {
00088         private:
00089                 uint8_t         stepState;              // Current index in the step sequence
00090                 int16_t         stepSpeed;              // Sign gives directions, __maxMotorSpeed - magnitude + 1 is the number of timer ticks per step
00091                 uint8_t         lastStep;               // Number of timer ticks since last step
00092                 int16_t stepsToGo;              // Number of steps to go until we finish the current set; set to -1 for continuous rotation
00093                 const uint8_t           *sequence;              // An array of pin configurations that correspond to the steps
00094                 uint8_t         seqSteps;               // Number of steps in the sequence of switch positions
00095                 uint8_t         channels[__channelsPerMotor__];         
00096                 uint8_t         chanCount;              // Number of channels in the array 
00097                 void            incrSeq (void); // Increment the step sequence by 1
00098                 void            decrSeq (void); // Decrement the step sequence by 1
00099         public:
00101                 shiftStepMotor (
00102                                                         // the number of steps in the sequence 
00103                                                 const uint8_t seqSteps,         
00104                                                         // an array of switch position, expressed as integers
00105                                                 const uint8_t *sequence,        
00106                                                         // the channel numbers on the board occupied by this device (always 4 elements long)
00107                                                 const uint8_t *channels);       
00109                 uint8_t         incrStep (int8_t dir);                                          
00111                 uint8_t         doSteps (int16_t steps, int16_t speed); 
00113                 uint8_t         setSpeed (int16_t speed);                               
00115                 int16_t         getSpeed (void);                                                        
00117                 int16_t         getStepsToGo (void);                                            
00119                 uint8_t         getSeqStep (void);                                                      
00121                 void            doDevTick (uint8_t bytesPerBoard, 
00122                                                                 uint8_t *boardBytes);
00123 };

00208 class shiftChain
00209 {
00210         private:
00211                 shiftBoard      **boards;                       // array of pointers to the board objects
00212                 uint8_t         boardCount;                     // number of boards in the chain
00213                 uint8_t         byteCount;                      // nuber of bytes in the chain
00214                 uint8_t         timerPrescaler;         // prescaler value to set timer frequency
00215                 uint8_t         timerVal;                       // the value the timer starts off at after each tick
00216                                                                                 // together, these two values control the tick frequency
00217                 uint8_t         timer;                          // the timer number we're using
00218                 uint8_t         dataPort;                       // shift register data pin
00219                 uint8_t         clockPort;                      // shift register clock pin
00220                 uint8_t         latchPort;                      // shift register latch pin
00221                 uint8_t         resetPort;                      // shift register master reset pin
00222                 uint8_t         indexPort;                      // index pin to indicate when the interrupt is running
00223                 uint8_t         dataPinMask;            // shift register data pin
00224                 uint8_t         clockPinMask;           // shift register clock pin
00225                 uint8_t         latchPinMask;           // shift register latch pin
00226                 uint8_t         resetPinMask;           // shift register master reset pin
00227                 uint8_t         indexPinMask;           // index pin
00228                 uint8_t         indexFlag;                      // flag to determine whether or not index pin is enabled
00229                 volatile uint8_t        *clk;           // port register for clock pin
00230                 volatile uint8_t        *dat;           // port register for data pin
00231                 volatile uint8_t        *lat;           // port register for latch pin
00232                 volatile uint8_t        *rst;           // port register for master reset pin
00233                 volatile uint8_t        *ind;           // port register for index pin
00234                 void            fastShiftOut (uint8_t *bytes);
00235                                                                                 // shift them bits out quick!
00236         public: 
00238                 shiftChain (
00240                                         uint8_t boardCount, 
00242                                         shiftBoard      **boards, 
00244                                         uint8_t dataPin, 
00246                                         uint8_t clockPin,
00248                                         uint8_t latchPin,
00250                                         uint8_t resetPin);
00252                 shiftChain (
00254                                         uint8_t boardCount, 
00256                                         shiftBoard      **boards, 
00258                                         uint8_t dataPin, 
00260                                         uint8_t clockPin,
00262                                         uint8_t latchPin,
00264                                         uint8_t resetPin,
00266                                         uint8_t indexPin);                              
00268                 uint8_t         getBoardCount (void);
00270                 shiftBoard      *getBoard (uint8_t index);
00272                 uint8_t         startTimer (
00274                                         uint8_t prescaler, 
00276                                         uint8_t timerVal, 
00278                                         uint8_t timer);
00280                 uint8_t         stopTimer (void);
00282                 void            doTick (void);
00283 };

00288 __extension__ typedef int __guard __attribute__((mode (__DI__))); 
00289 
00290 extern "C" int __cxa_guard_acquire(__guard *); 
00291 extern "C" void __cxa_guard_release (__guard *);
